channel.title: Hybrig-Scape
channel.description: I want to play in my own server with my friends (IRL) but how could they join my Hybrid-Scape Server ? PLEASE TELL ME !

item.title: Hybrig-Scape
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

If You want to do the simple way (If you dont know your pass of your router etc) use Hamachi. Simple and easy. (For private use with friends)

Link : https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi2/

Download it.
Instal it.
Start a network.

Then give your friends the link. Let them download and instal so they can join ur network on Hamachi. Start ur server
up give them the client with the Hamachi ip

Play!

Youridudock.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrig-Scape
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

After you click Start Server on the MoparScape client, have your friends use their MoparScape client to connect to your IP address.
